name: Happy
message: Let your unique awesomeness and positive energy inspire confidence in others

name: Upset
message: Wherever you go, no matter what the weather, always bring your own sunshine.

name: Perfect
message: If you want light to come into your life, you need to stand where it is shining

name: Sad
message: Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day in and day out

name: Tired
message: 'If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way',

name: Yay
message: “No matter how many obstacles come in front of me, I will not give up, and I will keep pushing forward because I know these obstacles are there to test my worthiness.”
